CODIF_DATA.RP_REGULATION: European Union, with participation by GPA countries
CODIF_DATA.HEADING: 01C03

TI_TEXT.P: Услуги по поддържане на други зелени площи

TITLE.P: Northern River Corridor Maintenance Framework

SHORT_DESCR.P: This framework is for the provision of river corridor maintenance services, including incident response support, covering work on raised flood banks, river banks and in channel works.
— minor landscaping and other related services.
This framework will enable the Operations Field Teams and Asset Performance Teams to meet this challenge and be incident ready.
The Framework is intended to support the Employer’s Operations Delivery and Asset Performance Teams in the following areas:
